mapper.insert: insert into tblMember (email, pw, nick, emailconfirm, phoneconfirm, socialtype) values (#{email},sha2(#{pw}, 256), #{nick}, #{emailconfirm}, 0, #{socialtype})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tblMember where email=#{email}
select count(*) from tblMember where nick=#{nick}
select emailconfirm, phoneconfirm from tblMember where nick = #{nick}
select exists(select * from tblMember where email = #{email} and socialtype = #{socialtype})
